name: I K I G A I (UI+Prototype)
description:
Anonymous mobile app-forum, which is based on a web-forum concept, yet it also has some differences. You are able to discuss predetermined themes along with blogging inside of your own feed. Mobile app merges two different types of a website (blog & forum).


The main feature is completely anonymous account to contain fiction name and unique avatar.


A new ethic as well as increasing social responsibility makes it difficult to express views without being criticised. So I found it important to create a space to speak freely, a network to be spiritually supportive.


UI Options:

 • Customisable Memoji

 • Alternating interface colours – lavender & chartreuse.


Image behind the inspiration originated from office supplies & writing materials that frequently use pleasant bright shades.


Graduation Project KAMA (Kyiv Academy of Media Arts)
